mapper.select: select r.seq, r.par_seq, r.mem_seq, r.contents, r.writen_time from tour_reply r join tour_board b on(r.par_seq=b.seq) order by r.writen_time desc
mapper.update: update tour_reply set contents=#{contents} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select p.seq, p.par_seq, p.mem_seq, p.contents, p.writen_time from tour_board b join tour_reply r on(b.seq=r.par_seq) join tour_reply_reply p on(r.seq=p.par_seq) order by p.writen_time desc
mapper.update: update tour_reply_reply set contents=#{recontent} where seq=#{idseq}
